Sept. 8, 1900 D Wishaw Contest (2nd Section)
Wishaw Contest (2nd Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
wishaw-contest-2nd-section
None
Sabbath Chimes
Houldsworth Park, Wishaw, North Lanarkshire, Scotland, UK Promoted by the Scottish Central Amateur Brass Band Association
Prizes: £7, £5, £3, £2, £1
Burnbank were originally place 1st, but at a meeting of the SCABBA on 29th September 1900, they were disqualified for playing ineligible men.
